comment: She was a tough grader, but she helped me with my writing skills. She stressed the fact that little mistakes count in the real world and she prepared her students for that by not cutting us any slack, which is what we need. This class requires a lot of attention, but you'll notice an improvement in your attention to detail. I'd take her again.

I took Professor Jackson's class last year, and I will say it is not a cakewalk. However, she always emphasized being prepared for the real world which was extremely helpful. You HAVE to read/do assignments in the book. She also gives pop quizzes so you must not get behind. Overall, I would say that she was tough, helpful, and detail oriented!

AVOID AT ALL COSTS. She is extremely unhelpful and unsympathetic. She is completely unclear about which assignments need to by typed or handwritten. Her grading style is completely haywire. You'll get an B on one assignment and fail the next one. She'll hand back papers and then give quizzes on them 2 months later. ABSOLUTELY the worst teacher ever

This professor is not helpful at all and gives you major attitude if you ask for help. I was really looking forward to this class but ended up hating it because of her. I highly recommend taking another professor!

She should not be a teacher at all. she is obviously just doing it on the side and her students are not a priority to her. she is not hard because this class is hard, she is hard because she acts like teaching this class is such a hassle to her. She is an impossible heartless woman. DO NOT TAKE HER!!!

WORST TEACHER AT KSU.. Do not take her!! All her grades are highly opinionated, even if the book says its right she will say its wrong. Worst attitude ever! She thinks shes better than everyone else and will put you down

Decent professor. Not too well-liked on this board, but if you work hard and understand the fundamentals of spelling and grammar, you'll do fine. She doesn't always show up with a smile on her face, but expecting that out of anybody is unrealistic. Never was she disrespectful. Oh, and show up for class. Yes, every day.

Now she is a hard grader, but if you try really hard you will be able to pass this class with a fair grade. Now if you have a problem with rudeness, I WOULD NOT TAKE HER IN A MILLION YEARS.. One student said this class was hard and she gave her an attitude and said, " THIS class is NOT hard." Oh and be on time for this class!!!!!!

I had this teacher for Writing for Communications fall (2011). I thought she was a pretty good teacher. She was hard and expects you to go by the APA rules. But she wasn't evil. She expects you to come to class, pay attention, and do the work. Its college your not supposed to not do those and still pass. If you don't want to work take someone else.
She has a serious attitude problem, the work that is intended for you to complete is NEVER clear, and she dose not give constructive criticism or help. Fend for yourself in this class.

She's probably the rudest professor i've ever met. I'm a COM major and she truly doesn't care about a single person but herself. I got kicked out of class because the kid next to me was talking. DO NOT take her if you have a choice! I never will again.

shes kinda rude, if you kiss up to her and play her game youll do fine. you gotta show up everyday to do the book work to get a participate grade in the class. the 2 projects are easy, just follow the guide lines. try to find a group leader and she already likes, helps in the long run
I had to retake the class because of her. If possible....find another teacher to take. She was extremly rude to everyone unless you sucked up. Shes the worst prof. I've EVER had! Hands down...

Class discussions are completely irrelevant to info on the tests. She is disrespectful to students except for the few who suck up to her. I got a C in the class but was later emailed by the dept that my grade was changed to a "B". I'm guessing they realized that she is incompetent and pure evil.
It's definitely an advantage that I had her for comm 1109. Still one of the hardest profs ever though, but she did help my writing. Just do the work she tells you to turn in and you should be fine.

As almost every other post has said, she cares only about herself and is extremely rude to students.  The total points for the class changed a week and a half before finals, and I'm still not sure we were asked to do every assignment that was shown.  She is definitely one of the worst professors I've taken in my 3 years of college, simply because o

Easy class if she likes you. Very opinionated, conservative, emotional. She will be flat out rude to you if she doesn't like you. I have seen her make people cry. I got an 89.5 and she gave me a B, because she didn't like me. She expects you to read the material before class and gets obviously irritated when nobody does.

This is the worst teacher i have ever had my entire life, she is emotional and takes her emotions on students, she is disrespectful, everything is personal to her, no matter how hard you'll study, if she doesn't like your face, expect no more than C or D. Absolutely avoid her, she will ruin you good experience at ksu.

Worst Professor at KSU.  I was shocked she did not wear a mask and bring a whip to class.  Rude to students and rarely covered material that would be on tests.  Study Guides unhelpful.  Just expect a "C" or lower.......
Run for your life!!!

This is the worst teacher/person that I have had the misfortune to come across at Kennesaw State.  DO NOT take this class.  She grades unfairly, lies, fights openly with students, she will degrade you in front of everyone, and does not follow her own stupid rules (i.e. being late to class).  If you have registered for her class drop it.  She loves
Avoid Taking this Instructor. The test definations don't match book or power point and she will not explain it ever.

DO NOT TAKE THIS CLASS! she is an awful teacher. She is extremely rude and plays favorites. Don't email her about your final grade because you'll get an extremely rude reply. She was AWFUL and only gives credit to people who talk in her class. The worst class I ever TOOK! I had a 79.8 average and she wouldn't even curve the grade! DO NOT TAKE HER!

This was the only class I recieved a B on this semester. It's not really all that difficult. She doesn't teach out of the book at all really, but all of the tests are over the book. class discussions feel more like group therapy than anything. She comes off as unintelligent. There were a few times she actually gave wrong information to the class

Expects a lot from the students. Will base her opinons and emotions on the class. She cried in the class twice. Calls on "favorites" only. If she knows your name, you will do good in the class. The tests are based off the book and powerpoints. Avoid this class freshman year.

This was my first year at Kennesaw, and I had her and she made me nervous. I never spoke in class, most the people who did good talked to her a lot. She is not bad i guess, you just have to understand her personality. She is tough and expects perfection. If you want to be on top of you game, take her class.
In order to pass her class you must kiss her ass.

I never felt such anxiety walking into her class every Friday. I was on pins and needles with this lady! Nothing you EVER do will be right. I took this lady a year ago and it still haunts me to this day the thought of her and the course! She is a a horrible PERSON and professor. Please, I beg of you, do NOT take this lady. And pass the word on.

Alisa T. Jackson synonymous with Satan. This women gets off to students suffering. She is entirely incompetent. Enduring her class makes me want to rip my fingernails off and stick my hands in lemon juice. If I saw her outside of class I would be on the news. Good luck.

HELL NO! Never ever,ever,ever IN YOUR LIFE CONSIDER THIS WOMAN for anything other than Napoleon's relative.  Worst person I have ever met, horribly inconsiderate, just down right awful, bias, ****, crybaby, ugly, grotesque,childish, only calls on favorites. Let's put it this way; expect to teach yourself,tests are unpassable If murder was legal..

NEVER TAKE HER!! she is NOT there to help her students, but instead her opinion is the ONLY opinion and will get offended taking it out on students grades. Group powerpt. projects were due today & 75% of the class was unaware it must  be turned in on CD. She gave 25% off if it wasnt. We explained it was unfair and she changed to 0 or 50% off!!!

Avoid taking her. She is extremely childish, picks favorites, and abuses her power as a teacher, if you want to call her that. Doesn't tell you on what she expects on projects or tests, let's you figure it out on your own. Tests are hard only because of the minute details. Will just walk out the class before a test because shes having a bad day.

I can not stress this enough. If you can help it, do not take this Communication course with this professor. All of the negative reviews are very accurate. I have never had a professor before that abused his/her power as much as this one. Instead of it being an open communication course, YOU are the slave, and she is the dictator, for the most part

Rude,Racist,Arrogant. Why a University would tolerate the likes of her is beyond me. She rarely knows her material. The tests are from outer space and rarely reflect the material covered in class. Very bad representation of Kennesaw University. Its a shame as this is a great College.

Extremely un-professional. Wheres short skirts, sits on the edge of her desk showing her usually non matching panties to the class..."sic". Is very dictatorial, refuses to provide help and answer questions. Her way or the highway. Class was a complete waste of credit hours and money

If you can help it,don't take this class. The professor will cancel class when she thinks not enough students are participating in discussion. Will also cancel class and not prepare you for an upcoming test.  She needs to keep her personal feelings out of the classroom otherwise she WILL take it out on the students.Once again avoid this class!
this lady sucks. honesty, i would rather scratch my face off than have to hear her whine and complain about her crappy life anymore. do not take her, and if you have a chance, kick her.

She's very short-tempered which makes attending her class very difficult because she's always huffin and puffin about something. When giving directions she's horrible and accuses you of not listening when you ask a question she supposedly already answered. Doesn't accept late work even with an excuse. Plays favorites and she doesn't have many.

I added this class during drop add, so I missed two classes because I was unsure if I could handle six classes. Needless to say I missed a syllabus quiz and assignment and she said I would recieve a "0" because she doesn't accept late work. How can someone get two 0's for a class they weren't even enrolled in yet?!?! Horrible professor!!!!

I agree, she is a terrible teacher. I was fortunate to be a favorite but hated the way she treated other students. If she is in a bad mood, the whole class suffers. VERY unfair grader, brings personal feelings into the classroom. UNPROFESSIONAL!!!

Do not take her. She really does pick favorites and is really bias on who she calls on. She will find very irrelevant things wrong with a presentation and take off huge points for it thus lowering your overall grade. Avoid taking her!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

This teacher should not be teaching anymore.she is just a G.P.A ruiner.Has favorites she calls, and very very unfair with her grading and class test.Never try to take her class if you don't want to mess up your G.P.A.

Very, very, very bias. Enjoys pointing out students not paying attention in class. her lectures are pretty much irrelevant but attendance is a chunk of your grade. For tests, you use the book A LOT but not lectures. Really bad teacher, really unpleasant. Convinced me to drop as a communications major.

Worst teacher I've had at KSU. She is rude and def. has favorites that she ONLY calls on. She gets off topic and doesnt explain material at all. She just expects you to know it and will get mad if you don't understand. Horribly unfair grader. Several people in my class sent emails to the department and even Dr. Papp. complaining.

One of the worst professors I have ever had. She attempts to make an entry level Communications class into something more than it should be. She picks favorites, and then shuns the rest of the class. Biased, does not explain assignments well and then when asked to clarify says she already told us and that we are stupid to ask for more explanation.
Mean condescending jerk. Plays favs tried her class three times dropped her class twice.
She can be a stern at times but she really isnt that bad. Just do the work, participate in discussion and show up and u should be fine!

I would like to give Ms. Jackson a good review. I loved this professor. I am a PR major so maybe I had that on my side but I thought she was clear about what she expected and very helpful. I had her my first semester back at KSU and she made me want to be in school after a 2 year break. I learned a lot and really enjoyed her class.

She should not be teaching anymore. Often late for class, very rude and disrespectful, and yelled for no reason. Gives quizzes that are not on the syllabus, deducts points without just cause, and gives offensive personal opinions. Does not know what she is teaching; on one test she counted questions wrong that were word for word in the book.
Do not take this class with this teacher, she has a bad attitude and is not very helpful.

This woman is ruining my life, i've never taken the time to rate a professor, but I feel like I absolutely MUST warn people about this teacher. She is mean-spirited, completely unfair, and will regularly lash out at people in class even if they ask a fairly reasonable question. She takes EVERYTHING very personal and wastes majority of class time.
Flies by the seat of her pants. Rude to students and extremely condescending. DON'T TAKE HER. She should not be teaching.

She requires class discussion and constantly THREATENS students who don't speak up with the "Participation Grade". So, I participated in every class. Some of my views differed from Ms. Jackson's and I said so, as respectfully as possible. At the end of the course I received a 'C' for participation despite missing only ONE class. She didn't like me.

I thoroughly disliked this professor and her class. We wasted SO much time on class discussion. Classmates discussed personal issues and gave countless "examples" of various definitions that did NOT fit the textbook's definitions. Very easily insulted, gets offended if you miss class. Nice person - terrible professor.

Ask a question and she rolls her eyes. Walks into class with an attitude every night. Rude to students, always gives the cold shoulder. I thought professors were supposed to answer questions and help students learn.

I cannot stand her. She walks in likes she is queen of the world. She always has an attitude. She does not take people's opinions well. She does not like anybody's writing unless it is similiar to her own.

Didn't even bother creating a syllabus for the class. Incomprehensible. Extremely limited communications knowledge, only knows PR. Does not like students asking questions. Questions and tests on material she never teaches. Condescending, rude to students, and will alter your grades retroactively without explanation.

Even though this is a general writing class, If you're not going the PR route, this class will be beyond useless for you. She only knows PR and ignores most everything else, isn't organized, will show up for class 45 mins late then yell at you for leaving, tells you of this wonderful project you will do, then cancels, and is generally rude.

First rule of thumb when taking this class: Burn the syllabus.  It means nothing! And don't even think about missing class...ever.  At best, she can help you improve your writing skills.  Beyond that, she is unorganized and unable to maintain order of her class. Alas, she was my only choice.  This class ended up being a complete waste of my time.
No Comments
